name: I am Yours open beta
description:
Embarking on possibly his last journey, an old man packs the possessions that made him who or what he became.

A text adventure at its heart, I am Yours deals with themes such as family, anxiety, loss and responsibility in an ambiguous yet relatable way, allowing the player to to construct a character based on interpretation and perspective.

When is a game not a game? I am Yours is questioning the notion of a physical edition. A commentary on the tangible value of possessions, it is being produced as both a digital video game and a 250 page book.

for more information, visit www.joystickdust.games

Twitter- iamyoursgame
